entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
